edu.calstatela.sawooope.gamestates.levels

Class LevelInputProcessor.TouchAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.calstatela.sawooope.gamestates.levels.LevelInputProcessor.TouchAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Touchable
    Enclosing class:
    LevelInputProcessor
    Deprecated. 
    This class will be redesigned due to inconsistent Object-Oriented design, However... it will have to do for now.

    public class LevelInputProcessor.TouchAction
extends java.lang.Object
implements Touchable
    TouchAction represents the gesture that the user is making on the screen. As of now the only gestures are:
    • Swipe
    • Tap
    • Drag
    Author:
    Benji
